attributes.action: Add an additive to antifreeze making it undisirable to cats.
attributes.additional_details: It is a simple thing that could save countless accidental and deliberate poisonings.
attributes.background: To pass legislation requiring companies add an additive to antifreeze making it undisirable to cats.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593625
